title: BRIEF-ERS Signs Deal With Irish Aviation Authority To Deliver New Aviation Safety Regulation System
text:
BRIEF-ERS Signs Deal With Irish Aviation Authority To Deliver New Aviation Safety Regulation System

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 09, 2019 07:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-ERS Signs Deal With Irish Aviation Authority To Deliver New Aviation Safety Regulation System Oct 9 (Reuters) - Information Services Corp : * ERS SIGNS AGREEMENT WITH IRISH AVIATION AUTHORITY TO DELIVER NEW AVIATION SAFETY REGULATION SYSTEM * INFORMATION SERVICES CORP -CO'S IRISH UNIT, ENTERPRISE REGISTRY SOLUTIONS LIMITED SIGNED AGREEMENT WITH IAA * INFORMATION SERVICES CORP - TOTAL VALUE OF IMPLEMENTATION CONTRACT IS APPROXIMATELY CAD$7 MILLION * INFORMATION SERVICES CORP - NEW SYSTEM IS EXPECTED TO GO-LIVE IN 2021

BRIEF-ERS Signs Deal With Irish Aviation Authority To Deliver New Aviation Safety Regulation System
